alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Peninsula; Kivalina and Red Dog Dock; Lower Kobuk Valley; Noatak Valley; Northern Seward Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 6:17AM AKST until January 16 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow with blizzard conditions and brief freezing rain possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting 50 to 60 mph. Visibility one quarter mile or less at times. * WHERE...Noatak Valley-Kivalina and Red Dog Dock-Lower Kobuk Valley- Baldwin Peninsula-Northern Seward Peninsula- * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could cause power outages.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Peninsula; Kivalina and Red Dog Dock; Lower Kobuk Valley; Noatak Valley; Northern Seward Peninsula
